welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Valladolid, a charming city known for its rich history and hospitable people. Get ready to explore and immerse yourself in our culture, as you discover the many wonders this beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay and have a memorable experience in Valladolid!"
